doc.title: Common Knowledge: An Oral History of 1988
doc.plot: This remarkable film takes a time lapse portrait of life in the Media Age by interviewing the same 29 people every three weeks for a whole year. It shows how we learn about events in our society. Before OJ, before Elian, before any of these things, it captured that strange shared experience we all have through the media. We follow the 29 real people through a year in their life, both publically and privately.
